original_text: The Lord also said to me, ‘I know what these people are like! They are proud people who do not want to obey me.
korean_text: 여호와께서 또 내게 말씀하여 이르시되 내가 이 백성을 보았노라 보라 이는 목이 곧은 백성이니라

sentences.original_text: The Lord also said to me
'I know what these people are like!'
who do not want to obey me.'
